column1: #Text=Older guest says : " He 's taking all the good stuff ! "
#Text=I 'm a cultural minister to the king .
#Text=" Katara says : " I 'm Kwa Mai , and this is ... Dum .
#Text=" Long Feng says : " Now where is your family ?
#Text=" Katara says : " Uh ... I do n't see them right now , but I 'm sure we 'll find them soon .
#Text=" Long Feng says : " Do n't worry , as your escort it would be dishonorable to abandon you ladies without finding your family first .
